name: Column.AttachTo
description:
Attaches a column to a target .
Input may be a single item or a list, make sure the lists are the same length.

Input:
Column: columns
Targets: elements
TopOrBase: base = 0, top = 1
cutstyle: CutColumn = 0, CutTarget = 1, None = 2
justification:  Minimum = 0,  Midpoint = 1, Maximum = 2, Tangent = 3
offset: positive for shorter length, negative for longer length
overwrite:  bool per item (it can be different for each column), if true current attachment will be ignored, if false current attachment will remain as it is.
contents:
Column.AttachTo - Attaches a column to a target .
Input may be a single item or a list, make sure the lists are the same length.

Input:
Column: columns
Targets: elements
TopOrBase: base = 0, top = 1
cutstyle: CutColumn = 0, CutTarget = 1, None = 2
justification:  Minimum = 0,  Midpoint = 1, Maximum = 2, Tangent = 3
offset: positive for shorter length, negative for longer length
overwrite:  bool per item (it can be different for each column), if true current attachment will be ignored, if false current attachment will remain as it is.
